title: Patient Safety Simulation-Based Team Collaboration Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of healthcare systems, mathematical problem-solving skills, and team project experience
context.additional_context: Learners engage in team-based simulation activities using smartphone-supported materials in limited-tech environments, training to apply mathematical predictive models to patient safety scenarios through real medical case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can resolve simulation-based patient safety crisis scenarios with over 80% accuracy through effective team communication
Learners can analyze the likelihood of medical errors using a three-tier risk assessment framework with mathematical modeling techniques
Learners can propose at least one patient safety improvement plan per team based on simulation case study results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
